item.title: VPS - SGP2 - host444244
item.description:
Apr 18, 07:36 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Apr 18, 07:27 UTC
Investigating - Estimated time to recovery : 1 hour(s)

Affected hosts

host444244

Affected instances

The list of instances listed below are currently
unavailable, due to hardware fault on the hypervisor(s) previously mentioned. We apologize for
any inconvenience caused while we resolve this issue.
